items.name: Add-in with notification toast
items.description: Highlights the currently-selected range and reports its address via a Fabric-based notification toast.

items.name: Document-object to DOM interaction
items.description: Lists all of the tables in the workbook, and creates a clickable hyperlink for each table.

items.name: Report-generation
items.description: Writes data to the workbook, applies basic formatting, and adds a chart bound to that data.

items.name: Basic "set" action
items.description: Gets the current selection and applies formatting to it.

items.name: Get selected data
items.description: Gets the text of the current selection using, the Common APIs that were first introduce in Office 2013.
